attributes.action: WAKE UP AND REALISE THAT THIS COUNRTY HAS TURNT INTO A LAUGHING STOCK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like Gordon Brown to spend the day with me in north London to see how very little the provisions the government spend millions of tax payers hard earned money goes towards and the very little effect these actually have within communities.. I feel that the government is totally out of touch as to what is really going on this country main topics housing, gun and knife crime that the government have no idea how to sort out and also health care services.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
